fullDescription.intro:
This node adds missing hydrogens to CDK molecules. You can choose if you want to add explicit hydrogens to fulfill the valencies or only implicit ones.
This node can process the input table in parallel. However, by default the usage of threads is disabled in the CDK plugin, because the CDK code may not be thread-safe in all places. If you want to enable multi-threading, change the setting in the KNIME preferences.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the molecular structure
Adds explicit hydrogens if checked, only implicit ones otherwise
Appends a new molecule column (with the name as specified in the text field) if checked, replaces the original column otherwise.

ports.outPort: As input but with added hydrogens
